text: int max ( int a , int b ) { if ( a > b ) return a ; return b ; } int main ( ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int A [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , B [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; while ( n > 0 ) { int N ; scanf ( "%d" , & N ) ; int i , j ; for ( i = 0 ; i < N ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & A [ i ] [ j ] ) ; B [ 0 ] [ 0 ] = A [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < N ; i ++ ) B [ i ] [ 0 ] = B [ i - 1 ] [ 0 ] + A [ i ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < N ; i ++ ) B [ i ] [ i ] = B [ i - 1 ] [ i - 1 ] + A [ i ] [ i ] ; for ( i = 2 ; i < N ; i ++ ) for ( j = 1 ; j < N - 1 ; j ++ ) B [ i ] [ j ] = max ( B [ i - 1 ] [ j ] , B [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ) + A [ i ] [ j ] ; int m = B [ N - 1 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < N ; i ++ ) if ( B [ N - 1 ] [ i ] > m ) m = B [ N - 1 ] [ i ] ; printf ( "%d\n" , m ) ; n -- ; } return 0 ; }
